name: Magical: Scoring for MTG
description:
Magical, the new companion app for
Magic: The Gathering
LIFE, POISON, COMMANDER, HISTORY +

Magic Scoring Re-imagined.

Clean, intuitive interface full of features.

KEY FEATURES
. . DAMAGE: Life, Poison, Commander
. . HISTORY: View & Edit
. . AVATARS + NAMES: Choose Them
. . 8 PLAYERS: Just in Case
. . LIFELINK + INFECT: Yes!
. . EXSANGUINATE: Yes!
. . SMART GAME STATE

OTHER FEATURES
. . Coin Flip
. . Sub-Scores, see all easily
. . Game Outcomes, choose one
. . 2 Game Formats, to start from

. . Backward Compatible to iPhone 5s
. . Running iOS 12.3

Hope You Enjoy. And Thank You.
